select qi.* from question_info qi
left join question_answer qa on qi.id = qa.question_id and qa.order_number = 0
where qi.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or qi.category like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or qa.text like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by qi.publish_time desc
limit ${pageSize*(page-1)},#{pageSize}

left join question_answer qa on qi.id = qa.question_id and qa.order_number = 0
